oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rebecca Buchanan portrait from yearbook
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Middle Tennessee State Normal School
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait photograph of Rebecca Buchanan, daughter of John Price Buchanan and aunt of James McGill Buchanan, from the 1929 Midlander, yearbook of Middle Tennessee State Normal School. Miss Buchanan taught public speaking at the college and was sponsor of the Drama Club. The club later became known as The Buchanan Players.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan, Rebecca
